      • getAvailableSpots

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getAvailableSpots​(Piece p)
        Finds all the locations where a piece can fit.
        Parameters:
        p - A `Piece` object
        Returns:
        An `ArrayList` of `Coordinate` containing all the locations on *this* `Board` the `Piece` "p" can be placed.
        See Also:
        Piece, Coordinate

        c - The `Coordinate` to play at
